---
- traveled from Nador, Morroco to Berlin, Germany
- had a leak in my Airbnb place (but not too bad and the host handled it very quickly and was nice)
- went to [JSConf EU](https://2019.jsconf.eu/) and met **so many great people** again. You can get your tickets for 2019 already!
- surprised my little brother for his graduation day
- packed my days in Germany with way too many meetings, didn't get so much stuff done because of those time killers.
- besides the many meetings, was busy with finishing two projects and preparing for new ones üëçüèª #keepshipping #alwaysdeliver
- packed my evenings with catching up with friends <3 So. Many. Amazing. People. And. Talks. I am very grateful :)
- realised that coming back to Germany just doesn't feel right (I am craving for more travel!).
- had my MacBook Pro fixed. what was only the [f*** Touchbar flickering](https://twitter.com/jonaskroeger/status/999361790940274688) turned into a new top case, battery and display (because Apple üôà, the device wasn't even 8 months old)
- added my new logo to my laptop <3

- traveled from Frankfurt, Germany to Podgorica, Montenegro
- THE NATURE OF MONTENEGRO IS SO AMAZING. Seriously, if you consider going there‚Ä¶ GO!
